gov.usgs.anss.util

Class ClientSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gov.usgs.anss.util.ClientSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientSocket
extends java.lang.Thread
    ClientSocket.java This represent one end of a socket. The "Client" is because this object is generally created by a "ServerSocket" when each new "Client" creates a connection. For instance, ServerThread creates on of this class for each subscriber who connects up. In this case the "Threading" and buffering of this class is needed to keep the ServerThread from blocking. Created on July 29, 2003, 5:50 PM

                      throws java.io.IOException
        sendBufAsGomberg() sends the buffer but builds the gomberg header with the current time and bogus route, node, and chan
        Parameters:
        buf - raw bytes to send
        len - number of bytes to send (should be less than buf.length
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if error occures writing the data
